name: Motel 6 Seattle Sea-Tac Airport South

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Basic hotel right near SEA-TAC airport. Low price, but noisy at night from nearby sports bar nightclub, but really convenient location. Rooms spacious but basic. Good if you need short term accommodation near airport.
reviews.title: MMmmmm...

likes.disliked: — noisy from nearby bar return of guests to hotel through night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here for a high school basketball tourney.Check in was fine....... until they lost our reservations.Upon arriving we had to pay $8.00 more than agreed......I was alittle upset but very tired,so I went ahead and payed. About 2:AM the police had to break up a fight in the room across the way from ours.....think I'll stay somewhere else next year............
reviews.title: Sheeeeeeeesh

reviews.text: After a week long trip, we had an early a.m. flight out of SeaTac. I was looking for an inexpensive motel that was close to the airport, close to our rental car return and in a safe neighborhood. This motel met our needs.
reviews.title: Convenient for early a.m. flight and to return rental car.

likes.liked: — Convenient location at a fair price.

aka: Motel 6 Seattle Sea-Tac Airport South Hotel
